SELECT b.id, b.parent_item_id, i1.name AS parent_item_name, CASE WHEN b.child_item_id IS NOT NULL THEN b.child_item_id ELSE b.child_material_id END AS child_prod_id, CASE WHEN b.child_item_id IS NOT NULL THEN i2.name ELSE m.name END AS child_prod_name, CASE WHEN b.child_item_id IS NOT NULL THEN 'ITEM' ELSE 'MATERIAL' END AS prod_type, b.consumption, s.name AS unit_name FROM BOM b JOIN ITEM i1 ON b.parent_item_id = i1.id LEFT JOIN ITEM i2 ON b.child_item_id = i2.id LEFT JOIN MATERIAL m ON b.child_material_id = m.id LEFT JOIN DETAIL_SYS_CODE s ON i1.unit = s.detail_code
AND (i1.name LIKE '%' || #{srhIdOrName} || '%' OR i1.id LIKE '%' || #{srhIdOrName} || '%')
